2.1.name: wordpress/plugin-list
2.1.description: By placing in your page or post by sources code or using toolbar icon 'Plugin List' in your Rich text editor(only if enabled) plugin replaces it with list of currently installed WordPress plugins. You can use various configuration options for tweaking plugin list.
